overview:
Josh is a co-founder of Handcrafted, a Ruby on Rails Development Consulting firm focused on creating applications built on a foundation of beautiful, maintainable, extensible, handcrafted code.

Joshâ€™s focus as a Web Developer spans multiple areas from Database Design, Ruby, javascript development using semantic handcrafted code, to designing and developing web applications and web services with Ruby on Rails.

Josh is a Host of The Web 2.0 Show, a podcast that profiles the people behind some of todayâ€™s coolest upcoming web services. Josh operates The Web 2.0 Show with partner in-crime and UX hacker, Adam Stacoviak.

Josh is also head of the development team behind Tasty Planner, a recipe sharing website that helps you create, plan and share recipes, menus, grocery lists and more. He led the team to victory while building Tasty Planner in the 2007 Rails Rumble competition.

milestones.description: Founded the Tasty Planner application and led the team to victory in the 2007 Rails Rumble competition.
